JOB DESCRIPTION: Dear Candidates,Greetings from APEX BARtech!!!Currently we are looking for Software Developers, and the job description for the same is as below: Knowledge of asp .net, C#, SQL and Oracle.Basic knowledge of Business Processes is must.The candidate will have to understand the client requirements and accordingly design the software. The candidate will be responsible for Installation, training and trouble shooting.The candidate will have to visit client place as and when required. Our software are for business processes only.
